mapper.select: SELECT review_tb_no , customer_tb_no , product_tb_code , review_tb_content , review_tb_writer , review_tb_reg_date , review_tb_rating , review_tb_img_path FROM review WHERE review_tb_no = #{reviewTbNo}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM rnum, re.review_tb_no , re.customer_tb_no , re.product_tb_code , re.review_tb_content , re.review_tb_writer , re.review_tb_reg_date , re.review_tb_rating , re.review_tb_img_path, pd.PRODUCT_TB_NAME FROM review re, product pd WHERE re.product_tb_code = pd.product_tb_code ORDER BY review_tb_no DESC) WHERE rnum >= #{startRow} AND rnum <= #{endRow}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review (REVIEW_TB_NO, CUSTOMER_TB_NO, PRODUCT_TB_CODE, REVIEW_TB_CONTENT, REVIEW_TB_WRITER, REVIEW_TB_RATING, REVIEW_TB_IMG_PATH) VALUES (review_seq.nextval, #{customerTbNo}, #{productTbCode}, #{reviewTbContent}, #{reviewTbWriter}, #{reviewTbRating}, #{reviewTbImgPath})
